element.description: Generates a series of links used to jump to a particular page index within the overall data set.

parameters.parameter: Number of pages before and after the current page in the range. The pager always displays links for 2 * range + 1 pages, unless that's more than the total number of available pages.
The number of rows displayed per page.
The source of the data displayed by the grid (this is used to determine how many rows are available, which in turn determines the page count).
